About PictriKit

Making screenshot combining simple, fast, and private

Our Mission

PictriKit was created with a simple goal: to provide a fast, easy-to-use, and privacy-focused tool for combining multiple screenshots into a single image. We believe that powerful tools should be accessible to everyone, which is why PictriKit is completely free and requires no registration or software installation.

In today's digital world, screenshots are an essential way to capture and share information. Whether you're creating tutorials, documenting bugs, sharing conversations, or compiling research, combining multiple screenshots into one cohesive image can save time and improve clarity. PictriKit makes this process effortless.

Why PictriKit?

Privacy First

All image processing happens locally in your browser. Your screenshots never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.

Lightning Fast

No uploads, no waiting. Process your screenshots instantly with our browser-based technology.

Completely Free

No hidden fees, no premium tiers, no watermarks. PictriKit is free for everyone, forever.

No Registration

Start using PictriKit immediately. No account creation, no email required, no hassle.

Works Everywhere

Use PictriKit on any device with a modern web browser - desktop, tablet, or mobile.

Multi-Language

Available in English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, with more languages coming soon.

How It Works

PictriKit uses advanced browser technology to process your images entirely on your device. Here's what makes it special:

  • Client-Side Processing: All image manipulation happens in your browser using JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas API
  • Smart Alignment: Our intelligent alignment system helps you position screenshots perfectly
  • Flexible Editing: Add annotations, text, and drawings to enhance your combined screenshots
  • Multiple Export Options: Download your final image in various formats and quality settings

Our Values

Privacy & Security

We take your privacy seriously. Unlike many online tools, PictriKit processes everything locally in your browser. We don't upload, store, or have access to your images. What happens in your browser, stays in your browser.

Accessibility

We believe powerful tools should be accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise or budget. PictriKit is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, with no learning curve.

Transparency

We're open about how our tool works and what data we collect (spoiler: very little). Check our Privacy Policy for complete details.

Continuous Improvement

We're constantly working to improve PictriKit based on user feedback. Have a suggestion? Let us know!

Use Cases

PictriKit is perfect for:

  • Tutorial Creation: Combine step-by-step screenshots into comprehensive guides
  • Bug Reporting: Show the complete sequence of events leading to an issue
  • Social Media: Create engaging visual stories from multiple screenshots
  • Documentation: Compile screenshots for technical documentation or reports
  • Presentations: Create visual aids by combining related screenshots
  • Research: Organize and present findings from multiple sources
  • Conversations: Combine chat screenshots to show full context
  • Comparisons: Place screenshots side-by-side for easy comparison

Technology

PictriKit is built with modern web technologies to ensure the best performance and compatibility:

  • HTML5 Canvas: For powerful image manipulation
  • Fabric.js: Advanced canvas library for smooth interactions
  • Responsive Design: Works seamlessly on all screen sizes
  • Progressive Web App: Fast loading and offline capabilities

Our Commitment

We're committed to keeping PictriKit:

  • ✅ Free forever
  • ✅ Privacy-focused
  • ✅ Ad-free (or minimally intrusive)
  • ✅ Regularly updated
  • ✅ User-friendly
  • ✅ Accessible to all
